info.name: San Francisco [Font]
info.description: Applies the San Francisco Font to all webpages.
info.additionalInfo: Note: If you don't have the San Francisco (SF Pro Display) font, the style will use a fallback San Francisco font available from Apple's AppleSocial Amazon AWS server. You can download the SF Pro Display font here (remember to use the TrueType version and install all fonts in the directory).
